column4: Please can someone help? When I deluser a user I get a notice, Warning: group `users' has no more members.. But I know that there are other users in the 'users' group. Is this a bug?
Please can someone help? When I deluser a user I get a notice, Warning: group `users' has no more members.. But I know that there are other users in the 'users' group. Is this a bug?
